settings.title-one: Interested in the ultimate beer-pairing experience this holiday season?
settings.paragraph-one: Enjoy Chicago's newest beer and food experience from acclaimed culinary brewery Moody Tongue. Nine-time Michelin Star Recipient Executive Chef Jared Wentworth and Brewmaster Jared Rouben have curated a selection of holiday packages from their newest concept: Moody Tongue Smoked Meats.
settings.paragraph-two: Moody Tongue Smoked Meats showcase quality ingredients, highlighting farm-to-table meats and support a number of local Midwestern farmers and producers.
settings.paragraph-next-one: Shipping is offered both via overnight and 2-day delivery options to ensure your package is fresh.
settings.paragraph-next-two: Smoked meats and beer shipped separately. If you would like to ensure your shipment arrives by a particular date, please email contact@moodytongue.com
settings.paragraph-card: All bundles include smokey meats, Carolina Gold Sauce, Kansas City Sauce, a Moody Tongue Bottle Opener, and a special beer to accompany the taste!
